remarks: Cancellation law for multiplication.  Theorem I.7 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
mulcand.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mulcand.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
mulcand.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
mulcand.4 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= 0 ) $.
mulcan2d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. C ) = ( B x. C ) <-> A = B ) ) $.
